name: Skybeam
description:
Skybeam

Skybeam is the name of my poem archive. Explore the roots of my mind through an atmospheric field of wheat, and the poems that I wrote.

Venture into the vast fields of wheat, try your hand at poem writing , or even just sit back and relax to the sounds of music and nature. 

There are a total of 32 different poems. Try to collect them all.

Thanks to BgAlex for helping me do some bug smashing.

Thanks to Alara Bread for SFX.

Thanks to Lily for being supportive and giving ideas.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

M1 - Click on words to write a poem.
